metadata.Title: CVE-2023-32650 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: An integer overflow vulnerability exists in the FST_BL_GEOM parsingmaxhandle functionality of GTKWave 3.3.115, when compiled as a 32-bitbinary. A specially crafted .fst file can lead to memory corruption. Avictim would need to open a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: gtkwave package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
